QuestData.Title: Pool of Tears
QuestData.Description: The trolls that lurk within this temple have done grievous harm to my kind, $n. We were sent here to guard this place, and were instead used to unleash the terrible powers within.$B$BI must beg you for the help only a mortal can give. You can be my hand within the temple; should I enter by myself, I risk being turned against my brothers as well.$B$BWe shall make a pact. If you wish to help, first gather Atal'ai artifacts from the waters around the temple, and return them to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 5 Atal'ai Artifacts from the Pool of Tears surrounding the Temple of Atal'Hakkar.
QuestData.CompletionText: Your gathering of these artifacts will be a sign of faith. Once rendered, I will perform the ritual.
QuestData.RewardText: The essence of the green dragonflight wafts from these artifacts; the vestiges of my corrupted kin. In purifying them, I form a bond between us.$B$BStep forward, $n, and receive the Oathstone of Ysera's Dragonflight.
